医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究描述了 SARS-CoV-2 亚变体的特征，为下一代 COVID-19 疫苗的开发提供信息研究人员鉴定了两种新型 SARS-CoV-2 XBB 变体：EG.5.1 和 XBB.2.3。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-characterizes-SARS-CoV-2-subvariants-to-inform-development-of-next- Generation-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-characterizes-SARS-CoV-2-subvariants-to-inform-development-of-next- Generation-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d8086b0-4ea4-436f-a732-fe87c41c60e3 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 10:58:00 -0400 Study characterizes SARS-CoV-2 subvariants to inform development of next-generation COVID-19 vaccines
研究调查了 COVID-19 后 PASC 的病理生理机制研究人员调查了 SARS-CoV-2 感染后 PASC 潜在的早期病理生理机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-investigates-the-pathophysiological-mechanisms-of-PASC-after-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-investigates-the-pathophysiological-mechanisms-of-PASC-after-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79aa6908-ed58-464c-9aaf-3ba088c2f4b5 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 10:47:00 -0400 Study investigates the pathophysiological mechanisms of PASC after COVID-19

研究报告意大利农村家禽养殖场的宠物狗和猫感染高致病性禽流感研究人员提供了意大利一个农村家禽养殖场的一只宠物猫和五只狗感染高致病性禽流感 (HPAI) H5N1 病毒的血清学证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-reports-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-A-infection-in-pet-dogs-and-cat-on-a-rural-poultry-意大利农场.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-reports-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-A-infection-in-pet-dogs-and-cat-on-a-rural-poultry-意大利农场.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02537a00-845d-4b6b-8d12-c7e722a5dca9 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 09:42:00 -0400 Study reports highly pathogenic avian influenza A infection in pet dogs and cat on a rural poultry farm in Italy
研究表明，由于 COVID-19 大流行，大学停课期间情绪暴饮暴食的频率增加研究人员进行了一项在线调查，以评估 COVID-19 大流行期间暴饮暴食的频率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-suggests-increased-Frequency-of-emotional-overeating-during-university-closures-due-to-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-suggests-increased-Frequency-of-emotional-overeating-during-university-closures-due-to-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff9d5fc-809d-4ddb-8f40-32738eea288f Mon, 04 Sep 2023 09:34:00 -0400 Study suggests increased frequency of emotional overeating during university closures due to the COVID-19 pandemic
研究探讨性别对大脑mRNA和蛋白质水平的作用及其基因调控研究人员通过分析大脑的 1,277 个蛋白质组，研究了生物性别对蛋白质水平及其基因组控制的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-explores-the-role-of-sex-on-mRNA-and- Protein-levels-and-its-genic-regulation-in-brain。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Study-explores-the-role-of-sex-on-mRNA-and- Protein-levels-and-its-genic-regulation-in-brain。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8899609d-c5f1-4250-8d6f-b9a24572238d Mon, 04 Sep 2023 09:26:00 -0400 Study explores the role of sex on mRNA and protein levels and its genetic regulation in brain
